downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 White Paper: How to Write Data Upgrade Scripts
downloadDescription: This paper describes how to write data upgrade scripts for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.

downloadFile.name: How to write Data Upgrade Scripts for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.xps

downloadFile.name: How to write Data Upgrade Scripts for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/b/0/5/b057bd6f-5d2c-479b-a5df-cc50eca7834f/How to write Data Upgrade Scripts for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.pdf

detailsSection:
This paper describes how to use the Microsoft Dynamics AX Data Upgrade Framework and to write data upgrade scripts for customer upgrade data models (Microsoft Dynamics AX tables). The Data Upgrade Framework can be used to perform data correction or data transformation.

The intended audience for this document is Microsoft Dynamics AX application developers.
detailsSection_file_name: How to write Data Upgrade Scripts for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.xps
How to write Data Upgrade Scripts for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • To view the XPS file, you will need Windows Vista or the Microsoft XML Paper Specification Essentials Pack.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file or XPS file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
